profile:
Tesona Electric Inc. is a family operated, fully serviced and licensed electrical company in the Ottawa area. Operated by Remi Clouthier a Master Electrician with 20 years in the electrical trade. 

Remi has put his heart and soul into providing outstanding electrical service to major electrical companies in the Ottawa and surrounding regions for many years now and wants to provide the same exceptional service to his own customers. 

We will always treat your space as if it were our own. We offer guarantees on all our work and will provide our electrical services while keeping your family or co-workers safe as we hold safety most important above all else.

 Let us show you what a great job we can do for you and call or email us for a quote today!
services:
RESIDENTIAL
New Construction Electrical Installation

Upgrading Service Panels

Replace Knob and Tube Wiring and Fuses

Outdoor Electrical including Pools, Spas, and Landscaping

Home Renovation including kitchens, bathrooms, basements and additions

Lighting Installation including recessed lighting, fans, pendants, and chandeliers

 Home Generator Installation

Electrical Installation for Tankless Water Heater System

Home Automation (such as Smart Home System)

Property Restoration Electrical

Secondary Dwelling Unit Electrical

Electric Vehicle Fast Charging System Installation
COMMERCIAL
Retrofitting for LED lighting

Lighting, Wiring, and Panel Installation (new and upgrades) for new business/office/warehouse construction and renovation

Commercial Generator Installation and Repair

Retail fitups

Emergency Lighting Installation (new and upgrading)

Single and three phase electrical service installation or upgrades

SERVICE CALLS
Emergency electrical work both commercial and residential including power restoration provided 24/7
warranty_terms: We offer a 1-year warranty on all our services and products we use (with that said please don’t hesitate to contact us after the first year, we want to help fix your issue)

profile:
People depend on electricity now more than ever. It keeps us connected to the world around us, it keeps our food fresh, it drives industries worldwide. Because we all depend on electricity to get us through the days, you need to make sure that your home or business is wired correctly by a trained professional.

There are obvious inconveniences that come with unreliable electricity, but there are bigger concerns than spoiled food or not being able to check your inbox. When your home or business’s wiring, or even just a small feature of it, hasn’t been connected by a trained professional, you have to be prepared for the possibility of an electrical fire.

There is too much in your home and business to choose an unqualified contractor to handle your electrical needs. If you want to ensure the security, function and efficiency of your electricity, it starts with a call to Regional Electric Corp..

For the last several years, Regional Electric Corp. has been providing expert residential and commercial electrical services to homes and businesses all over the area. Since our first year in the electrical business, Regional Electric Corp. has had our sights set on being the clear-cut best option for any electrical service a client in the area may require. We do this by constantly training our electricians to add more skills to better serve our clientele. We also always make sure we are on time because reliable service produces reliable results. Plus, we respect and value our customer’s time.

Whenever you need help with anything related to your home or business’s electrical services, give Regional Electric Corp. a call and we’ll be happy to assist you.
